entry.title: Saying Hello To Bitcoin
entry.summary: Critics have suggested that the collapse of FTX demonstrates flaws with Bitcoin, but this is a misunderstanding of its fundamentals. This is an opinion editorial by Pierre Rochard, the Vice President of Research at Riot. Ben Sixsmith has published a thoughtful piece in The Spectator entitled ‚ÄúSaying Goodbye To The Crypto Nerd Utopia,‚Äù providing an outside perspective on the crisis facing the broader crypto economy. While there‚Äôs a lot I agree and disagree with in his piece, I‚Äôll focus on the primary line of reasoning: Bitcoin is one of many cryptocurrencies, cryptocurrencies have no intrinsic value, and cryptocurrencies are speculatively traded on exchanges like FTX; therefore, the scandalous collapse of FTX reveals that Bitcoin is no better than the status quo. The first paragraph in Six‚Ä¶

entry.title: Bahamian Government Officials Allegedly Asked SBF to Mint Millions of Dollars in New Tokens Amid the FTX Collapse
entry.summary:
On Monday, court documents from lawyers involved with the FTX Trading LTD Chapter 11 bankruptcy case allege that the government of The Bahamas asked the disgraced FTX co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried (SBF) to mint new crypto tokens. The lawyers detailed that it was a ‚Äúrequest for live, dynamic access that would be provided immediately to the government of the Bahamas and to Messrs.‚Äù
Government of Bahamas Accused of Getting Special Treatment From Disgraced FTX Co-Founder Sam Bankman-Fried
Following Sam Bankman-Fried‚Äôs (SBF) arrest in The Bahamas, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) charged SBF with fraud over the FTX collapse. Furthermore, reports show that the Southern District of New York (SDNY) prosecutor‚Äôs office and SDNY attorney Damian Williams have charged SBF with crim‚Ä¶

entry.title: Sam Bankman-Fried Indicted And Charged With Fraud
entry.summary:
U.S. courts have filed eight separate charges against SBF according to an unsealed indictment. Sam Bankman-Fried, the disgraced former CEO of collapsed cryptocurrency exchange FTX, has been formally indicted on charges of fraud, money laundering and others. The unsealed document reveals eight charges from the United States Southern District Court of New York, including:
Conspiracy to commit wire fraud on customers Wire fraud on customers Conspiracy to commit wire fraud on lenders Wire fraud on lenders Conspiracy to commit commodities fraud Conspiracy to commit securities fraud Conspiracy to commit money laundering And conspiracy to defraud the United States and violate the Campaign Finance Laws.
This follows Bankman-Fried‚Äôs arrest on the night of December 12 in the Bahamas by local autho‚Ä¶

entry.title: Litecoin ‚ÄúMega Whales‚Äù Now Hold 15.4% Of Supply, Highest Since June 2017
entry.summary:
On-chain data shows the Litecoin ‚Äúmega whales‚Äù now hold around 15.4% of the total supply, the highest value in more than five years.
Litecoin Addresses With 1 Million Or More LTC Now Hold Highest Supply Share Since June 2017
According to data from analytics firm Santiment, LTC‚Äôs mega whales have been busy accumulating during the last five weeks. The indicator of interest here is the ‚ÄúLTC Supply Distribution,‚Äù which tells us which wallet groups are carrying what percentage of the total Litecoin supply right now.
The wallet groups or bands define a range between which the balances of wallets falling into any particular band lie. For example, the 1-10 coins group includes all wallets currently holding between 1 and 10 tokens. The Supply Distribution data for this group then measures the‚Ä¶

entry.title: Amid Speculation and Rumors Surrounding Binance, Exchange Token BNB Suffers Losses From the Alleged FUD
entry.summary:
Following the FTX collapse, the largest cryptocurrency exchange by trade volume, Binance, has been surrounded by rumors and speculation in recent times. On Dec. 12, 2022, Reuters reported that U.S. Department of Justice prosecutors have been investigating Binance, according to four people familiar with the matter. Moreover, while a number of crypto assets have risen in value this past week, Binance‚Äôs exchange token has slid roughly 6.9% against the U.S. dollar over the last seven days.
Binance‚Äôs BNB Takes a Hit from the Speculation Surrounding the World‚Äôs Largest Crypto Exchange
This week, Binance is dealing with a lot of rumors, speculation, and FUD (fear, uncertainty, and doubt) following the aftermath of the recent FTX collapse. Across social media, there‚Äôs been speculation concerni‚Ä¶

entry.title: Tighter Security Regulations For Unregistered Crypto Platforms In Canada
entry.summary:
Canadian regulators have advised putting in place a coordinated oversight regime for all crypto trading platforms. Crypto platforms that are seeking registration will need to sign an undertaking to adhere to investor protections before they fall under formal regulatory surveillance.
This move follows the enormous fall of the global cryptocurrency platform FTX. This is among the new guidelines that have been set by the Canadian Securities Administrators (CSA), which is an umbrella body for securities regulators in the Canadian region.
According to the Canadian Securities Administrators, crypto oversight has been strengthened. The CSA said:
Following recent events in the crypto market, the CSA is strengthening its approach to oversight of crypto trading platforms by expanding existing‚Ä¶

With our new ZOGI token on Cronos chain, along with plans for further collaboration, we‚Äôre expecting massive growth and a wealth of opportunity in working together with Cronos.‚Äù Ste‚Ä¶

entry.summary: Simone Berry and Akbar Hamid accepted the Cryptie for People of Crypto's Metaverse Pride Parade from presenter Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Decentraland's Metaverse Fashion Week and Heal from The Sandbox and Code Green.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Lens Protocol Wins DeFi Project of the Year
entry.summary: Bradley Freeman and Christina Beltramini accepted the Cryptie for Lens Protocol from presenter Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Aave, dYdX, and OlympusDAO.

entry.title: The Crypties Awards 2022: Coinbase Ventures Wins Investor of the Year
entry.summary: Shan Aggarwal accepted the Cryptie for Coinbase Ventures from presenter Amanda Cassatt of Serotonin at the inaugural Crypties Awards from Decrypt Studios in Miami on November 30. The other nominees in the category were Paradigm, a16z, and Polychain.

entry.title: Blocknative CEO Matt Cutler at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: Blocknative's Matt Cutler sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to tell his Web3 origin story and Blocknative's business‚Äîplus misconceptions in the crypto space.

entry.title: Fintech Lawyer: Crypto Companies Need to Seek Legal Advice Before Launch
entry.summary: Lisa Rubin, a blockchain attorney with Paul Hastings, sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss legal misconceptions the industry still holds.

entry.title: Phantom Co-Founder Francesco Agosti at 0xpo Crossroads
entry.summary: One of the minds behind the popular Solana dapp sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at 0xpo Crossroads in San Francisco on November 3 to discuss the history of Phantom and what he‚Äôs looking forward to in Web3.

entry.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.

entry.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.

entry.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'
entry.summary: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.

entry.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next
entry.summary: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin
entry.summary: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.
